generated_text:
You are an accessibility (A11Y) testing AI assistant.
Given the following A11Y violations in JSON format, perform the following:
1. Return a confidence score between 0 and 100 indicating overall accessibility health.
2. Summarize top 3 most critical violations.
3. Provide an accessibility readiness badge: PASS, NEEDS REVIEW, or FAIL.
Here is the JSON:
[
  {
    "ViolationID": "color-contrast",
    "Impact": "serious",
    "Description": "Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/color-contrast?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      ".et_pb_custom_button_icon"
    ]
  },
  {
    "ViolationID": "duplicate-id",
    "Impact": "minor",
    "Description": "Ensures every id attribute value is unique",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/duplicate-id?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      "#top-menu \u003e .menu-item-67.menu-item-has-children.menu-item-type-custom"
    ]
  },
  {
    "ViolationID": "heading-order",
    "Impact": "moderate",
    "Description": "Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/heading-order?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      "h3"
    ]
  },
  {
    "ViolationID": "label-title-only",
    "Impact": "serious",
    "Description": "Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/label-title-only?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      "input"
    ]
  },
  {
    "ViolationID": "landmark-one-main",
    "Impact": "moderate",
    "Description": "Ensures the page has only one main landmark and each iframe in the page has at most one main landmark",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/landmark-one-main?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      "html"
    ]
  },
  {
    "ViolationID": "link-name",
    "Impact": "serious",
    "Description": "Ensures links have discernible text",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/link-name?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      ".et-social-facebook \u003e .icon"
    ]
  },
  {
    "ViolationID": "meta-viewport",
    "Impact": "critical",
    "Description": "Ensures \u003cmeta name\u003d\"viewport\"\u003e does not disable text scaling and zooming",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/meta-viewport?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      "meta[name\u003d\"viewport\"]"
    ]
  },
  {
    "ViolationID": "region",
    "Impact": "moderate",
    "Description": "Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks",
    "HelpUrl": "https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/region?application\u003daxeAPI",
    "Selectors": [
      "html"
    ]
  }
]
1. Confidence Score: 52 (Taking into account the serious impact violations, I lower the score)
2. Top 3 Most Critical Violations:
   - color-contrast: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds (impact: serious)
   - label-title-only: Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes (impact: serious)
   - link-name: Ensures links have discernible text (impact: serious)
3. Accessibility Readiness Badge: NEEDS REVIEW (Due to critical and serious impact violations)
